              def create
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                # Handle unit_id from URL parameter (from unit show page button)
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            
              23
            

            
              
            

                unit_id = params[:unit_id] || inspection_params[:unit_id]
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            
              23
            

            
              
            

                unit = nil
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            
              23
            

            
              
                
                  else: 16
                
              
                
                  then: 7
                
              
            

                unless current_user.is_active?
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            
              7
            

            
              
            

                  flash[:alert] = current_user.inactive_user_message
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            
              7
            

            
              
                
                  then: 5
                
              
                
                  else: 2
                
              
            

                  redirect_to unit_id.present? ? unit_path(unit_id) : root_path and return
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            
              16
            

            
              
                
                  else: 3
                
              
            

                if unit_id.present?
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 13
                
              
            

                  # Securely handle unit association
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            
              13
            

            
              
            

                  unit = current_user.units.find_by(id: unit_id)
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            
              13
            

            
              
                
                  then: 1
                
              
                
                  else: 12
                
              
            

                  if unit.nil?
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                    flash[:alert] = I18n.t("inspections.errors.invalid_unit")
          
      62.

              1
            

            
              
            

                    redirect_to root_path and return
          
      63.

      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64.

                # Create minimal inspection with just the unit and default values

                @inspection = current_user.inspections.build(
          
      68.

      69.

      72.

      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73.

      76.

      77.

                if @inspection.save
          
      78.

                  then: 1

      81.

                  flash[:notice] = if unit.nil?
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                    I18n.t("inspections.messages.created_without_unit")
          
      84.

                  else

      86.

      87.

      88.

      89.

      91.

      92.

              def replace_dimensions

                  if @inspection.save
          
      126.

      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127.

      131.

              def select_unit
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            
              18
            

            
              
            

                @units = current_user.units
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            
              18
            

            
              
            

                @title = t("inspections.titles.select_unit")
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            
              18
            

            
              
                
                  then: 2
                
              
                
                  else: 16
                
              
            

                if params[:search].present?
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                  @units = @units.where("name LIKE ? OR serial LIKE ? OR manufacturer LIKE ?",
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

                    "%#{params[:search]}%", "%#{params[:search]}%", "%#{params[:search]}%")
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      148.

                if params[:manufacturer].present?
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  @units = @units.where(manufacturer: params[:manufacturer])
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            
              18
            

            
              
                
                  then: 1
                
              
                
                  else: 17
                
              
            

                if params[:has_slide].present?
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  @units = @units.where(has_slide: params[:has_slide] == "true")
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            
              18
            

            
              
            

                @units = @units.order(:name)
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157.

      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159.

      160.

      161.

              14
            

            
              
            

              def update_unit
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            
              6
            

            
              
            

                unit = current_user.units.find_by(id: params[:unit_id])
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            
              6
            

            
              
                
                  then: 2
                
              
                
                  else: 4
                
              
            

                if unit.nil?
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                  flash[:alert] = t("inspections.errors.invalid_unit")
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to select_unit_inspection_path(@inspection) and return
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
            

                # Update the inspection with the new unit and copy all dimensions
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            
              4
            

            
              
            

                @inspection.unit = unit
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            
              4
            

            
              
            

                @inspection.copy_attributes_from(unit)
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            
              4
            

            
              
                
                  then: 4
                
              
            

                if @inspection.save
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            
              4
            

            
              
            

                  flash[:notice] = t("inspections.messages.unit_changed", unit_name: unit.name)
          
      175.

      176.

              def report

              def complete

                # Check if inspection can be completed

                if validation_errors.any?
          
      215.

      217.

      218.

      219.

      220.

      223.

      224.

      225.

              def mark_draft

      238.

              def filtered_inspections_query
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            
              62
            

            
              
            

                current_user.inspections
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            
              
            

                  .includes(:unit, :inspector_company)
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            
              
            

                  .search(params[:query])
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            
              
            

                  .filter_by_result(params[:result])
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            
              
            

                  .filter_by_unit(params[:unit_id])
          
      250.

      251.

      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            
              
            

                  .order(created_at: :desc)
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253.

      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254.

              def inspection_params
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            
              
            

                # Get the base params with permitted top-level attributes
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            
              89
            

            
              
            

                inspection_specific_params = %i[
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            
              
            

                  inspection_date inspection_location passed comments unit_id inspector_company_id unique_report_number
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            
              
            

                ]
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            
              89
            

            
              
            

                copyable_attributes = Inspection.new.copyable_attributes_via_reflection
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            
              89
            

            
              
            

                base_params = params.require(:inspection).permit(inspection_specific_params + copyable_attributes)
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            
              
            

                # For each assessment, dynamically permit attributes based on the model
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            
              
            

                assessment_types = %w[
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            
              89
            

            
              
            

                  user_height_assessment
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            
              
            

                  slide_assessment
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            
              
            

                  structure_assessment
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            
              
            

                  anchorage_assessment
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            
              
            

                  materials_assessment
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            
              
            

                  fan_assessment
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            
              
            

                  enclosed_assessment
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            
              
            

                ]
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            
              89
            

            
              
            

                assessment_types.each do |assessment_type|
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            
              623
            

            
              
                
                  else: 23
                
              
                
                  then: 600
                
              
            

                  next unless params[:inspection]["#{assessment_type}_attributes"].present?
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Get permitted attributes dynamically from the assessment model
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            
              23
            

            
              
            

                  permitted_attrs = permitted_assessment_attributes(assessment_type)
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            
              23
            

            
              
                
                  then: 23
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  if permitted_attrs.any?
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            
              23
            

            
              
            

                    base_params["#{assessment_type}_attributes"] =
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            
              
            

                      params[:inspection]["#{assessment_type}_attributes"].permit(*permitted_attrs)
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            
              89
            

            
              
            

                base_params
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            
              14
            

            
              
            

              def permitted_assessment_attributes(assessment_type)
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            

            
              
            

                # Convert assessment_type string to model class
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            
              23
            

            
              
            

                model_class = assessment_type.camelize.constantize
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            

            
              
            

                # Get all column names from the model
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            
              23
            

            
              
            

                all_attributes = model_class.column_names
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            

            
              
            

                # Exclude system/protected attributes (but keep id for updates)
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            
              23
            

            
              
            

                excluded_attributes = %w[inspection_id created_at updated_at]
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            

            
              
            

                # Return the permitted attributes
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            
              23
            

            
              
            

                (all_attributes - excluded_attributes).map(&:to_sym)
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue NameError
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            

            
              
            

                # If model class doesn't exist, return empty array
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            

            
              
            

                []
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            
              14
            

            
              
            

              def no_index
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            
              413
            

            
              
            

                response.set_header("X-Robots-Tag", "noindex,nofollow")
          
      308.

              end
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      310.

              def set_inspection
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            

            
              
            

                # Try exact match first, then case-insensitive match for user-friendly URLs
          
      312. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    312. 
            
              362

      313.

      314.

                  else: 345
                
              
                
                  then: 17
                
              
            

                unless @inspection
          
      316.

      317.

      318.

      319.

                  else
          
      320.

      321.

              def inspections_to_csv
          
      341. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    341. 
            
              8
            

            
              
            

                CSV.generate(headers: true) do |csv|
          
      342. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    342. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Get headers dynamically
          
      343. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    343.

                  headers = csv_headers
          
      344. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    344.

                  csv << headers
          
      345.

      346.

                  # Export whatever inspections are already filtered by the index action
          
      347.

                  @complete_inspections.includes(:unit, :inspector_company, :user).each do |inspection|
          
      348. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    348. 
            
              9

              def build_runout_calculation_text(platform_height, required_runout)

              def build_wall_height_result(user_height)
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

                {
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            
              8
            

            
              
            

                  user_height: user_height,
          
      153.

              def wall_height_requirement_text(user_height)
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            
              8
            

            
              
            

                thresholds = SafetyStandard::SLIDE_HEIGHT_THRESHOLDS
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            
              8
            

            
              
            

                case user_height
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 2
                
              
            

                when 0..thresholds[:no_walls_required]
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                  "No containing walls required"
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 2
                
              
            

                when thresholds[:no_walls_required]..thresholds[:basic_walls]
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                  "Walls must be at least #{user_height}m (equal to user height)"
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 2
                
              
            

                when thresholds[:basic_walls]..thresholds[:enhanced_walls]
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                  enhanced_height = calculate_enhanced_wall_height(user_height)
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                  "Walls must be at least #{enhanced_height}m (1.25 user height)"
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 2
                
              
            

                when thresholds[:enhanced_walls]..thresholds[:max_safe_height]
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                  enhanced_height = calculate_enhanced_wall_height(user_height)
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                  "Walls must be at least #{enhanced_height}m + permanent roof required"
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                else
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

                  "Exceeds safe height limits (>#{thresholds[:max_safe_height]}m)"
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            
              4
            

            
              
            

              def calculate_enhanced_wall_height(user_height)
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            
              4
            

            
              
            

                (user_height * 1.25).round(2)
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            
              4
            

            
              
            

              def build_json_response
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            
              3
            

            
              
            

                calculation_type = params[:calculation][:type]
          
      182.

                  when: 2
                
              
            

                case calculation_type
          
      183.

              2
            

            
              
                
                  when: 1
                
              
            

                when "anchors" then build_anchor_json_response
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            
              1
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when "user_capacity" then build_capacity_json_response
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when "slide_runout" then build_runout_json_response
          
      186.

      188.

      190.

              def unit_params
          
      204.

                unit_specific_params = %i[

                  name serial manufacturer photo description
          
      206.

                  owner model manufacture_date notes
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            
              
            

                ]
          
      208.

            class ApplicationJob < ActiveJob::Base
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

              # Automatically retry jobs that encountered a deadlock
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

              retry_on ActiveRecord::Deadlocked
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

              # Most jobs are safe to ignore if the underlying records are no longer available
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

              discard_on ActiveJob::DeserializationError
          
      7.

            # RPII Utility - Anchorage Assessment model

            class AnchorageAssessment < ApplicationRecord

              16
            

            
              
            

              belongs_to :inspection

              # Anchor counts (alphabetical order)

    6.

              validates :num_high_anchors, :num_low_anchors,
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                numericality: {greater_than_or_equal_to: 0, only_integer: true},
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

                allow_blank: true

              # Pass/fail assessments

              16

              108324
            

            
              
            

                  value = source.send(attr)

              108324
            

            
              
                
                  then: 108324

      183.

              def copyable_attributes_via_reflection

                  Unit.column_names
          
      196.

                def dimension_range(value, tolerance)
          
      334. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    334. 
            
              6
            

            
              
            

                  (value * (1 - tolerance))..(value * (1 + tolerance))

                end
          
      336.

                def dimension_stats(column)

                  max = maximum(column)

                  {avg:, min:, max:}
          
      342.

                  area_calculation = "width * length"

                inclusion: {in: [true, false]},

              # Scopes

              scope :search, ->(query) {
          
      103.

                if query.present?
          
      104.

              scope :filter_by_result, ->(result) {

      132.

              def self.search_conditions
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            
              18
            

            
              
            

                "inspections.inspection_location LIKE ? OR inspections.id LIKE ? OR " \

              def self.search_values(query) = Array.new(6) { "%#{query}%" }

              def self.both_dates_present?(start_date, end_date) =
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

                start_date.present? && end_date.present?
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147.

              delegate :name, :serial, :manufacturer, to: :unit, allow_nil: true
          
      149.

              def reinspection_date
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152.

                  else: 179
                
              
                
                  then: 2
                
              
            

                return nil unless inspection_date.present?

    153. 
            
              179
            

            
              
            

                inspection_date + 1.year

    154. 
            

            
              
            

              end

              def primary_url_path
          
      163.

                  then: 1
                
              
            

                if complete?
          
      164.

      205.

      96.

                def calculation_metadata
          
      97.

                    anchors: {

      102.

                      method_name: :calculate_required_anchors,
          
      103.

                end

                private
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144.

                def anchor_formula_text
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            
              337
            

            
              
            

                  area_coeff = ANCHOR_CALCULATION_CONSTANTS[:area_coefficient]
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            
              337
            

            
              
            

                  base_div = ANCHOR_CALCULATION_CONSTANTS[:base_divisor]
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            
              337
            

            
              
            

                  safety_fact = ANCHOR_CALCULATION_CONSTANTS[:safety_factor]
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            
              337
            

            
              
            

                  "((Area  #{area_coeff})  #{base_div})  #{safety_fact} safety factor"
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151.
